<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description/> <name>Update ready state scenario to published</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var scenarioPlanGr = new GlideRecord(WSMConstants.TABLES.SCENARIO_PLAN); scenarioPlanGr.addQuery('state', WSMConstants.SCENARIO_PLAN_STATES.READY); scenarioPlanGr.query();
scenarioPlanGr.setValue('state', WSMConstants.SCENARIO_PLAN_STATES.PUBLISHED); scenarioPlanGr.updateMultiple();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-12-13 13:00:51</sys_created_on> <sys_id>ae8b28b8c33711105d6e3810a840dd8b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Update ready state scenario to published</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">bbf41256073620102648e7a30ad3002b</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">bbf41256073620102648e7a30ad3002b</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_ae8b28b8c33711105d6e3810a840dd8b</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-12-13 13:33:40</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Update ready state scenario to published
